if.test: searchStartDate != null and searchStartDate != '' and searchEndDate != null and searchEndDate != ''

sql.if: AND MEM_ADV_REG_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(#{searchStartDate},'-', '')||'000000' AND REPLACE(#{searchEndDate},'-', '')||'235959'
AND MEM_ADV_REG_ID IN (SELECT ADM_MST_ID FROM T_ADM_MST WHERE ADM_MST_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchMemAdvRegNm} || '%')
AND MEM_MST_MEM_ID IN (SELECT MEM_MST_MEM_ID FROM T_MEM_MST WHERE MEM_MST_HP3 LIKE '%' || #{searchMemMstMemTel} || '%')
AND MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE IN (SELECT CMN_COM_IDX FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_UP_IDX = #{searchMemAdvQstTypeUp})
AND MEM_ADV_MDL_NO IN (SELECT PRD_MST_CD FROM T_PRD_MST WHERE PRD_MST_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchPrdMstNm}||'%')

mapper.select: /* Inquiry.selectInquiryListCount */ SELECT COUNT(MEM_ADV_IDX) FROM T_MEM_ADV WHERE 1=1

/* Inquiry.selectInquiryList */ SELECT S2.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, S1.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_ADV_IDX, MEM_ADV_TYPE, (SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = MEM_ADV_TYPE) AS MEM_ADV_TYPE_NM, MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE, (SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE) AS MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE_NM, (SELECT CMN_COM_UP_IDX FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE) AS MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE_UP, (SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = (SELECT CMN_COM_UP_IDX FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE)) AS MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE_UP_NM, MEM_ADV_TITLE, MEM_ADV_RPL_YN, CASE WHEN MEM_ADV_TYPE = 2238 THEN MEM_MST_MEM_ID ELSE MEM_ADV_REG_ID END AS MEM_ADV_REG_ID, CASE WHEN MEM_ADV_TYPE = 2238 THEN A.MEM_MST_MEM_NM ELSE (SELECT ADM_MST_NM FROM T_ADM_MST WHERE ADM_MST_ID = A.MEM_ADV_REG_ID) END AS MEM_ADV_REG_NM, MEM_ADV_REG_DT, MEM_ADV_MBL_YN, MEM_ADV_UPD_DT, MEM_ADV_UPD_ID, (SELECT ADM_MST_NM FROM T_ADM_MST WHERE ADM_MST_ID = A.MEM_ADV_UPD_ID) AS MEM_ADV_UPD_NM, MEM_ADV_CHN_GBN FROM T_MEM_ADV A WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY MEM_ADV_REG_DT DESC ) S1 ) S2 WHERE S2.RNUM BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}

/* Inquiry.selectInquiryInfo */ SELECT MEM_ADV_IDX, MEM_ADV_TYPE, (SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = MEM_ADV_TYPE) AS MEM_ADV_TYPE_NM, MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE, (SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE) AS MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE_NM, (SELECT CMN_COM_UP_IDX FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE) AS MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE_UP, (SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = (SELECT CMN_COM_UP_IDX FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE)) AS MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE_UP_NM, MEM_ADV_TITLE, MEM_ADV_RPL_YN, CASE WHEN MEM_ADV_TYPE = 2238 THEN MEM_MST_MEM_ID ELSE MEM_ADV_REG_ID END AS MEM_ADV_REG_ID, CASE WHEN MEM_ADV_TYPE = 2238 THEN A.MEM_MST_MEM_NM ELSE (SELECT ADM_MST_NM FROM T_ADM_MST WHERE ADM_MST_ID = A.MEM_ADV_REG_ID) END AS MEM_ADV_REG_NM, MEM_ADV_CS_STR, (SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = MEM_ADV_CS_STR) AS MEM_ADV_CS_STR_NM, MEM_ADV_CS_ITM, (SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = MEM_ADV_CS_ITM) AS MEM_ADV_CS_ITM_NM, MEM_ADV_MDL_NO, ORD_MST_CD, MEM_ADV_CONTENTS, MEM_ADV_MAIL_YN, MEM_ADV_RPL_CONTENTS, MEM_ADV_MBL_YN, MEM_ADV_REG_IP, MEM_ADV_REG_DT, MEM_ADV_UPD_DT, MEM_ADV_UPD_IP, MEM_ADV_UPD_ID, (SELECT ADM_MST_NM FROM T_ADM_MST WHERE ADM_MST_ID = A.MEM_ADV_UPD_ID) AS MEM_ADV_UPD_NM, MEM_MST_MEM_ID, MEM_MST_MEM_NM, CASE WHEN MEM_ADV_HP1 IS NULL AND MEM_ADV_HP3 IS NULL THEN (SELECT MEM_MST_HP1||'-'||MEM_MST_HP2||'-'||MEM_MST_HP3 FROM T_MEM_VIEW WHERE MEM_MST_MEM_ID = A.MEM_MST_MEM_ID) ELSE MEM_ADV_HP1||'-'||MEM_ADV_HP2||'-'||MEM_ADV_HP3 END AS MEM_TEL_NO, CASE WHEN MEM_ADV_MAIL IS NULL THEN (SELECT DECODE(MEM_MST_MAIL,null,'',MEM_MST_MAIL) FROM T_MEM_VIEW WHERE MEM_MST_MEM_ID = A.MEM_MST_MEM_ID) ELSE MEM_ADV_MAIL END AS MEM_ADV_EMAIL FROM T_MEM_ADV A WHERE MEM_ADV_IDX = #{MEM_ADV_IDX}

/* Inquiry.selectInquiryMailInfo */ SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MEM_ADV_REG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MEM_ADV_REG_DT, /* 등록일 */ MEM_ADV_IDX, /* 글번호 */ MEM_ADV_TYPE, /* 구분 */ MEM_MST_MEM_NM, /* 회원명 */ (SELECT MEM_MST_MAIL FROM T_MEM_MST WHERE MEM_MST_MEM_ID = A.MEM_MST_MEM_ID) AS MEM_ADV_EMAIL, /* 회원이메일 */ (SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = (SELECT CMN_COM_UP_IDX FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE)) AS MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE_UP_NM, /* 문의유형1 */ (SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE) AS MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE_NM, /* 문의유형2 */ ORD_MST_CD, /* 주문번호 */ MEM_ADV_MDL_NO, /* 상품코드 */ MEM_ADV_TITLE, /* 제목 */ MEM_ADV_CONTENTS, /* 내용 */ TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MEM_ADV_UPD_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MEM_ADV_UPD_DT, /*답변등록일 */ MEM_ADV_RPL_CONTENTS, /* 답변내용*/ MEM_ADV_UPD_ID, /* 답변자 ID */ (SELECT ADM_MST_NM FROM T_ADM_MST WHERE ADM_MST_ID = A.MEM_ADV_UPD_ID) AS MEM_ADV_UPD_NM /* 답변자 */ FROM T_MEM_ADV A WHERE MEM_ADV_IDX = #{MEM_ADV_IDX}
mapper.update: /* Inquiry.udateInquiry */ UPDATE T_MEM_ADV SET MEM_ADV_RPL_YN = 'Y', MEM_ADV_RPL_CONTENTS = #{MEM_ADV_RPL_CONTENTS}, MEM_ADV_UPD_ID = #{MEM_ADV_UPD_ID}, MEM_ADV_UPD_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), MEM_ADV_UPD_IP = #{MEM_ADV_UPD_IP} WHERE MEM_ADV_IDX = #{MEM_ADV_IDX}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_MEM_ADV_IDX.NEXTVAL AS MEM_ADV_IDX FROM DUAL
/* Inquiry.insertInquiry */ INSERT INTO T_MEM_ADV ( MEM_ADV_IDX, MEM_ADV_TYPE, MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE, MEM_ADV_CS_STR, MEM_ADV_CS_ITM, MEM_MST_MEM_ID, MEM_MST_MEM_NM, MEM_ADV_MDL_NO, ORD_MST_CD, MEM_ADV_TITLE, MEM_ADV_CONTENTS, MEM_ADV_RPL_YN, MEM_ADV_MAIL_YN, MEM_ADV_RPL_CONTENTS, MEM_ADV_READ_CNT, MEM_ADV_MBL_YN, MEM_ADV_REG_DT, MEM_ADV_REG_IP, MEM_ADV_REG_ID, MEM_ADV_UPD_DT, MEM_ADV_UPD_IP, MEM_ADV_UPD_ID ) VALUES( #{MEM_ADV_IDX}, #{MEM_ADV_TYPE}, #{MEM_ADV_QST_TYPE}, #{MEM_ADV_CS_STR}, #{MEM_ADV_CS_ITM}, #{MEM_MST_MEM_ID}, #{MEM_MST_MEM_NM}, #{MEM_ADV_MDL_NO}, #{ORD_MST_CD}, #{MEM_ADV_TITLE}, #{MEM_ADV_CONTENTS}, 'Y', #{MEM_ADV_MAIL_YN}, #{MEM_ADV_RPL_CONTENTS}, 0, 'N', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss'), #{MEM_ADV_REG_IP}, #{MEM_ADV_REG_ID}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss'), #{MEM_ADV_REG_IP}, #{MEM_ADV_REG_ID} )
